sentences.en: " The name is'Lines on the Back of a Confederate Note,'" he said.
sentences.cn: " 题目是《写在一张联盟钞票上》, " 他说.

sentences.en: And she had embroidered half a dozen sofa - pillow cases with the Confederate flag on them.
sentences.cn: 上面的星星确实偏了一点,有些几乎成了圆的,其余的有六个甚至七个尖头,但效果还是很好.

sentences.en: Many Federal opponents joined the confederate army during the Civil War.
sentences.cn: 南北战争期间,许多北方联邦的反对者加入了南方同盟军.

sentences.en: Many times his sightings of Confederate troop movements prevented heavy losses to the Union forces.
sentences.cn: 有许多次,由于他观测到南方同盟军队的调动情况,使联邦军队避免了严重损失.

sentences.en: Robert E . Lee surrenders the Confederate forces Appomattox Courthouse in Virginia.
sentences.cn: 罗伯特·. 李率南方同盟军在弗吉尼亚州阿波马托克斯投降.

sentences.en: She would be unable to ask her confederate indoors.
sentences.cn: 她不能请她的同谋者到屋里去.

sentences.en: The Confederate dead and wounded at New Hope Church ran high.
sentences.cn: 南部联盟军在纽霍教堂的伤亡是惨重的.

sentences.en: The Confederate States perceive that they cannot carry all before them with a rush.
sentences.cn: 南部邦联可以看出,他们不可能突然一下子大获全胜.

sentences.en: The Federals fought against the Confederate soldier during the Civil War.
sentences.cn: 在南北内战中,联邦军队的士兵们同南部联军作战.

sentences.en: The state also provided resources valuable to the Confederate cause.
sentences.cn: 此外,佛州也提供许多珍贵的资源供南方联盟使用.

sentences.en: The thief was arrested, but his confederate escaped.
sentences.cn: 小偷被逮住了，但他的同伙却逃之夭夭。

sentences.en: The young woman was his confederate, of course.
sentences.cn: 这个年轻女子当然是他的同谋。

sentences.en: There were dissensions within the Confederate cabinet, disagreements between President Davis and his generals.
sentences.cn: 南部联盟内阁中存在分歧.总统和将军们之间也不融洽.

sentences.en: They seem to think I made off with the Confederate treasury.
sentences.cn: 他们似乎认为我把邦联的国库给拐走了.

sentences.en: They were Confederate soldiers walking home.
sentences.cn: 他们都是些复员回家的联盟军士兵.

sentences.en: They were organized as the Confederate States of America under Jefferson Davis.
sentences.cn: 他们组成以戴维斯为首的美利坚邦联.

words.tran_cn: 使联盟；使联合；同伙；帮凶

trans.tran_cn: 使联盟；使联合；同伙；帮凶
